Name: SET_LAST_STATE
Description: Set the last state that is saved in flash memory.

Name: GET_LAST_STATE
Description: Get the last state that is saved in flash memory.

Name: NEW_LOG_FILE
Description: Close the current log file and switch to a new one.

Name: RESET_CHIP
Description: Initiate a reset of the board.

Name: SET_CURRENT_STATE
Description: Set the current state of the system state machine.

Name: GET_CURRENT_STATE
Description: Get the current state of the system state machine.

Name: SET_FLIGHT
Description: Enable the condition allow ejection of the flight unit from the rocket.

Name: GET_FLIGHT
Description: Get the flight condition state
Response description: Whether or not the flight mode is enabled.

Name: SET_PRE_LAUNCH_TIMER
Description: Set the pre launch timer.

Name: SET_VIDEO_ENABLED
Description: Enable or disable the GoPros.

Name: RESET_RECOVERY
Description: Reset the state of the recovery thread.

Name: MOTOR_ENABLED
Description: Enable or disable all reaction wheel motors.

Name: MOTOR_WARMUP
Description: Enable or disable the motor warmup sequence.

Name: SET_CONFIG
Description: Set a configuration parameter.

Name: GET_CONFIG
Description: Request the value of a configuration item from the secondary device.
Response description: The value of the requested configuration item.

Name: SET_PWM
Description: Set the pwm signal that should be send if the ADCS is in "MODE_PWM_DEBUG".

Name: SET_RPM
Description: Set the rpm signal that should be send if the ADCS is in "MODE_RPM_DEBUG".

Name: SET_ADCS_MODE
Description: Set the mode of the ADC system.

Name: DEPLOY_PARACHUTE
Description: Deploy the parachute. This bypasses all software checks! Use with care!

Name: SEND_IRIDIUM_MESSAGE
Description: Send a predefined test message trough the Iridium network.

Name: CALIBRATE_IMU
Description: Initiate calibration of one of the IMUs.
Response description: Whether or not the calibration was successful.

Name: SET_PAYLOAD_VIDEO
Description: Enable or disable the video recording by the payload.

Name: SET_RECOVERY_STATE
Description: Set the state of the recovery thread.
